name: tech-matchup-app
description: MERN-stack application that allows users to create a matchup between two technologies and vote on their favorite technology. The application currently uses  GraphQL API built with Apollo Server and Apollo Client. Also use React Router's `<Switch>` component in the routes.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
